page.title: 07The Trawler Race.
page.content: On{Bank Holiday Monday}it was time to hold the{9th Annual Trawler Race}.The rain was pouring down really hard.In the whole competition there were 28 boats altogether.There were two types of boat.First,the trawler,a boat that drags a net along in the water.Second,the crabber,which has a flat deck and one line that can carry 80 crab pots. The race begins and ends in{Weymouth {Harbour}The boats are decorated and the crews have water fights,squirting hosepipes,and throwing water bombs at each other There were other events taking place,like jumping off Town Bridge and Morris Dancing. Paul Moxham.
